instructions: microwave-safe dish; sprinkle with garlic powder.
Cover and microwave on high for 2 minutes; stir.
Heat 1-2 minutes longer or until no longer pink; drain.
Cover and microwave on high for 20-25 minutes or until vegetables and rice are tender, stirring twice.
title: Zucchini Beef Casserole
steps: Crumble beef into a 1-1/2-qt. microwave-safe dish; sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and microwave on high for 2 minutes; stir. Heat 1-2 minutes longer or until no longer pink; drain. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Cover and microwave on high for 20-25 minutes or until vegetables and rice are tender, stirring twice.
